Title: Wulon, the Granite Sentinel
Description:
One of the quilen statues in Guo-Lai Halls came to life and nearly killed my precious Kun. I won't have it! No one threatens my Kun.

I want you to go in there and smash the thing to pieces. I'd do it myself, but I need to attend to my lover's wounds first.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Anji Autumnlight at the Ruins of Guo-Lai in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
